content:
On the latest master (265c14d) when running lake exe cache get it prints:

Fetching ProofWidgets cloud release...
lake stdout:
error: build failed
lake stderr:
error: build failed
uncaught exception: Failed to fetch ProofWidgets cloud release: lake failed with error code 1

and the Lean server refuses to work until this is fixed.
Can you remove .lake from your project and try again?

Thanks that fixed it!
Can we add that suggestion to lake itself when it crashes? Because the current output contains no useful information
This is not an issue with lake itself but specific to a certain recent situation with proof widgets, it should not usually occur
same error and same solution :) Seem to be universal package manager solution (I hav done rm -rf .node_modules many times before)
